resources:
Panic Button Stay safe. Technology is advancing at the best of its pace. Every sector of our lives is touched by its impact, but not the life itself. This is our little step towards saving lives.\nPanic Button is an emergency first aid application that is capable of providing the latest first-aid information, treatment, procedures and instructions. Hence providing relief in times of disaster or emergencies. This is an offline service that can be accessed from anywhere and by anyone. Welcome to Panic Button An initiative towards saving lives
Latest First-Aid information, treatment and all other necessities
Find First-Aid for various medical issues Previously set Emergency Contacts can be accessed Nearby hospitals can be reached in time Access from Lock Screen itself Permit us to help you This app requires to access your Contacts, GPS, Location, etc Loading…

Enable draw over other apps Panic button requires this permission to enable the panic button over the lock screen. Grant Permission Sign in to let us gather your information for the panic button.
